title: (x) Fuel Buster - Futura, Kabel {Raph, Grant}
content:
oh... how horrible these last couple of days have been without Typophile..   
   
i could not get in..   
   
   
okay..   
i recognize this font but cannot remember where i saw it...   
i know i saw it recently in thread here.   
   
Buster with the special e   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144358im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/48779.jpg)
author: zpunktled

comments.content:
'FUEL' is set in [Futura Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144358/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/extra-bold/testdrive.html?s=FUEL&p=72), not Kabel.   
   
'Buster' and 'Made in Germany' are indeed set in Kabel, but not the ITC version as linked above. They use [the Linotype version](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019144358/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/black/testdrive.html?s=Buster+Made+in+Germany&p=48) which has a square dot for the lowercase 'i' in the Black weight, rather than the diamond shaped one in ITC's ultra weight.
